  • Field Details

    • ships

      public List<Ship> ships

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int size)
      Constructor for Board.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the board. The board will be a square with size x size. The size must be between 10 and 20. If the size is less than 10, the board will be 10 x 10. If the size is greater than 20, the board will be 20 x 20. The default size is 10 x 10. The board will be initialized with all cells empty.

  • Method Details

    • getRows

      public int getRows()
      Returns the number of rows on the board.
      Returns:
      The number of rows on the board.

    • getColumns

      public int getColumns()
      Returns the number of columns on the board.
      Returns:
      The number of columns on the board.

    • placeShip

      public boolean placeShip(int bowRow, int bowColumn, int length, boolean horizontal)
      Place the ship on the board.
      Parameters:
      bowRow - The row of the bow (front) of the ship.
      bowColumn - The column of the bow (front) of the ship.
      length - The number of cells occupied by the ship.
      horizontal - Whether the ship occupies a single row or column. If true, the ship occupies a single row. If false, the ship occupies a single column. The ship cannot wrap around the board. The ship must not overlap another ship.
      Returns:
      true if the ship was placed successfully, false otherwise.

    • placeAllShips

      public void placeAllShips(List<Ship> shipsToFaction)
      Place all ships randomly on the board.
      Parameters:
      shipsToFaction - The list of ships to place..

    • takeShot

      public boolean takeShot(int row, int col)
      Take a shot at the specified cell.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the cell.
      col - The column of the cell.
      Returns:
      true if the shot hit a ship, false otherwise. If the shot hit a ship, the cell status is updated to HIT. If the shot missed a ship, the cell status is updated to MISS.

    • getShip

      public Ship getShip(Point point)
      Returns the ship at the specified cell.
      Parameters:
      point - The coordinates of the cell.
      Returns:
      The ship at the specified cell, null if there is no ship.

    • getCellStatus

      public Board.Status getCellStatus(int row, int col)
      Returns the status of the specified cell.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the cell.
      col - The column of the cell.
      Returns:
      The status of the specified cell.

    • areAllShipsSunk

      public boolean areAllShipsSunk()
      Checks if all ships on the board are sunk.
      Returns:
      true if all ships on the board are sunk, false otherwise.

    • updateCellStatus

      public void updateCellStatus(int row, int col, Board.Status status)
      Updates the status of the specified cell.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the cell.
      col - The column of the cell.
      status - The new status of the cell.

    • resetBoard

      public void resetBoard()
      Resets the board. All cells are set to EMPTY. All ships are removed.
